title: Executive Order 5919-Power-Site Restoration No. 472, Oregon
content: So much of the Executive order of December 12, 1917, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 661, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 3 N., R. 3 W., sec. 17, SE. ¼
sec. 21, N. ½ NW. ¼, SW. ¼ NW. E. ½ SW. ¼;
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5919-Power-Site Restoration No. 472, Oregon Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361498
